title: Reacting to a Crazy CFB Week 7
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy, Ryan McGee, and Desmond Howard break down the weekend full of Top 25 matchups, including Tennessee's electric win over Alabama. Plus, Tennessee kicker Chase McGrath joins the show to talk about his game-winning field goal to lift the Volunteers over the Crimson Tide. Also, the crew reacts and overreacts to the state of some college football teams halfway through the season.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew reacts to what was a rough weekend for undefeated ranked teams
